description: {"blocks":[{"key":"tmb3","text":"Placeholder tutorial for the use of the Planet Microbe Semantic Web Application, accompanying the PhD dissertation work of Kai Blumberg.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1tcjm","text":"This protocol is a  temporary place holder for the protocol to use the Planet Microbe Semantic Web API. This protocol is included as part of Kai Blumberg's PhD dissertation work. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lh4a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mu76","text":"This work is contained within this github repository: https://github.com/hurwitzlab/planet-microbe-semantic-web-analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":66}],"data":{}},{"key":"7pbjr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pfbm","text":"Subsequent versions of this protocol will include the following sections:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"avt54","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pafj","text":"1) A brief introduction and overview of the system ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajhk6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f56jh","text":"2) A description of the command line options (arguments flags) for the `assemble_query.py` script. This script is a command line python script which can be used to assemble and submit a SPARQL query to the Planet Microbe RDF database.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0bcj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"629bv","text":"3) An explanatory page showing how to navigate the relevant OBO ontologies (e.g., GO, NCBITaxon, ENVO) to search for ontology terms which can used in queries to discover information. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82oso","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"252rj","text":"4) A \"how to\" example showing how to use the system to query for all annotations of samples within a specific GO class hierarchy.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hdt8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqnm0","text":"5) A \"how to\" example showing how to use the system to query for all annotations of samples within a specific NCBITaxon class hierarchy.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"db0bp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5dbt","text":"6) Documentation of several examples of R code that can be used to process and analyze the query results delivered from the system. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qu4s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1q69f","text":"Stay tuned!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4hb8","text":"-Kai","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9C28EA69133011EDB1220A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://github.com/hurwitzlab/planet-microbe-semantic-web-analysis"}}}}

title: Planet Microbe Semantic Web Application
